title: A simple ICMP monitor with web interface
author: Eun
content: readme.md icmpmon simple icmp monitor web interface.demoprebuilt files are the releases section.runningicmpmon -c config.hjsonwarranty product comes without warranty any form.buildingrequirementsgolang 1.8gcc ( *nix)tdm64-gcc ( windows)buildinggit clone https://github.com/eun/icmpmon.git get -u github.com/jinzhu/gorm/... get -u gopkg./eapache/channels.v1 get -u golang.org/x/net/websocket get -u github.com/hjson/hjson-go -u github.com/jteeuwen/-bindata/...cd icmpmon./.bat notesuses mozilla's metrics-graphics.changelog0.8: initial release0.6: switched metrics-graphicscontributingpull requests are welcome. that be doneimprove webinterface, better charts? rewrite at ?
